data.title: All About Tad Quiz
data.meta_description: Tad knows how to get the woman and be funny in the process! Test your knowledge on all things Tad right now! Good luck! All air dates are American.
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. Which actor originated the role of Tad in 1973?

Answer: Matthew Anton

Although Michael E. Knight is the actor best known as Tad, Matthew Anton originated the role in 1973. Tad was only ten years old when he debuted on "AMC" and it was revealed he was the child of Opal and Ray Gardner. Jeff Martin and Mary Kennicott were going to adopt Tad but Mary was shot to death. Joe and Ruth, eventually, adopted Tad.

2. When Tad was a teenager, what drug did he smoke?

Answer: Marijuana

Tad had an addiction to marijuana when he was younger and even stole money from his grandma, Kate Martin, to pay for his addiction. Eventually, Tad kicked the habit and stopped smoking marijuana. However, he got a new addiction and that was to swooning women!

3. Who was Tad's first wife?

Answer: Dottie Thornton

Tad was romantically interested in Hillary Wilson (Langley Wallingford's daughter) but he had a short affair with Dottie Thornton, which resulted in her becoming pregnant with Tad's child. Tad married Dottie but, when she lost the baby, they divorced. Tad, initially, started to date Dottie because Dottie's mother, Edna, paid him to do so to bolster Dottie's self-esteem.

4. How is Tad related to Kelsey Jefferson?

Answer: He is her adoptive half-uncle

Kelsey "Kate" Jefferson is the daughter of Tara Martin and Jim Jefferson. Tad and Tara are half siblings by adoption (Tara's parents are Joe and Helen Martin and Tad's adoptive parents are Joe and Ruth Martin) so that makes Tad Kelsey's adoptive half-uncle.

5. In 2003, Tad was a volunteer for which organization?

Answer: Habitat for Humanity

Tad volunteered for Habitat for Humanity during this year. In July of 2003, Tad and a bunch of other people built a home for a family in need in Pine Valley. A couple other volunteers for Habitat of Humanity in Pine Valley, at this time, were Jack Montgomery, Joe Martin, and Brooke English.

6. Tad and Adrian Sword are half brothers since they both share the same biological mother, Opal. Who is Adrian's father?

Answer: Frank Dawson

Adrian came to town in 1998 to investigate Palmer stealing Nazi art paintings. Near the end of that year, he saw pictures of his father, Frank Dawson, at Opal's residence. In January of 1999, Opal confessed to Adrian that she was his mother since she had an affair with Frank. Adrian was upset at Opal, at first, but they eventually bonded. Matthew St. Patrick portrayed Adrian from 1998 to 2000.

7. During the Fan February episode of 2003, which of these women did NOT sleep with Tad?

Answer: Erica Kane

The Fan February episode of 2003 was a highlight for all the ABC soap operas. This show featured stories and scenes that fans wanted to see but never had, at that point (and fans submitted ideas for the episodes). For the Fan February episode of 2003, "AMC" had Tad and Erica plan to get married. On their wedding day, many women came to Tad's apartment and slept with Tad. Tad never got to sleeping with Erica during this episode.

8. What was Tad's favorite snack food with Dixie?

Answer: Chicken fingers

Tad and Dixie had a lot of things in common, like friendship (They were initially friends and eventually married). However, the one thing they both loved a lot was chicken fingers. They ate this snack food on many occasions while they were an item on the show. Dixie died in January of 2007 when she ate poisoned pancakes meant for Babe Carey.

9. At Tad's third wedding to Dixie, what color dress did Dixie wear?

Answer: Pink

Tad and Dixie married for the third time in 1999 with all of their family and friends present. Dixie had on a pink dress at this wedding of hers to Tad. At Tad and Dixie's first wedding, Dixie wore white and, at their second wedding, Dixie wore brown.

10. Tad was late to his wedding with Hillary Wilson because bank robbers had locked him in the vault at the bank. Who was also in the vault with Tad?

Answer: Robin McCall

Tad was prepared to marry Hillary and he went to the bank on his wedding day. On that day, robbers came in and robbed the bank. They locked Tad in the vault with Robin McCall. When Hillary saw that Tad was late, she rushed out of the church where she was to marry Tad and ran out into the street as Edna Thornton was driving up. Hillary was okay but told Edna to take her to the bank to get Tad. Tad was released from the vault and he and Hillary married. Scenes from this wedding can be seen on the DVD, "ABC Daytime's Greatest Weddings", that was released in 2004.

Source: Author CAGuy0206

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor Gamemaster1967 before going online.
